title: Steampunk Tea Party: Cakes & Toffees to Jams & Teas
description: Experience the most decadent and delectable treats in Steampunk Tea Party!Join Miss Emilly Ladybird on a delicious adventure as she travels to fascinating destinations--just in time for tea! Whether enjoying a relaxing tea ceremony in Shangri-La or protecting Her Majesty's tea and cake against Martians, her exploits will be both tantalizing and tasty!Join the party and enjoy:More than 30 stunning recipes for all types of cakes, cookies, jams and beverages, all guaranteed to delight your senses.Simple tips and tricks to create even more scrumptious choices that will impress your very important guests.Beautiful Steampunk embellishments that will make your dishes the height of conversation, no matter what exotic location you may visit.
author: Jema 'Emilly Ladybird' Hewitt
